This is aimed at web devs who have mastered the concepts explained in <nowiki>[[ScreencastTeam/Requests/WebDevelopmentPartOne]]</nowiki> and who wants to set up a LAMP server on their computer, either for testing or serving purposes.

* Install apache2, libapache2-mod-php5, libapache2-mod-python and libapache2-mod-ruby, mysql-server, mysql-admin, and phpmyadmin.
* Test the above
* Apply a mysql password.
